permafrost.tundra.server.content

Class ProxyContentHandlerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandlerFactory
      • permafrost.tundra.server.content.ProxyContentHandlerFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTTPCompressionContentHandlerFactory

    public class ProxyContentHandlerFactory
extends com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandlerFactory
    An Integration Server content handler factory that proxies method calls to another content handler factory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandlerFactory factory
      The content handler returned by the factory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyContentHandlerFactory(com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandlerFactory factory)
      Creates a new ProxyContentHandlerFactory object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandler create()
      Returns a content handler.
      com.wm.app.b2b.server.ContentHandlerFactory getContentHandlerFactory()
      Returns the content handler factory which this factory proxies method calls to.
      static void register()
      Wraps all existing content part handler registrations with a ProxyContentHandlerFactory.
      static void unregister()
      Unwraps all existing content part handler by replacing ProxyContentHandlerFactory objects with the original factories that were registered.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static void register()
        Wraps all existing content part handler registrations with a ProxyContentHandlerFactory.

      • unregister

        public static void unregister()
